column4: hello how to connect pc2 using firestarter? pc1 server is connected to the net
>> use ssh and open port 22 in firestarter
: in my second machine? or same box?
: but pc2 has limited or no internet connection.... what ip to setup there?
: my isp setup static in my modem..so i will just plug the cable to my built-in NIC then i can internet now
>> well then you should be able to connect them
firestarter have error like this " error failed to start firewall the device eth1 is not ready" but it is plug there
>> firestarter : try Preferences > Network settings, and choose the correct device
>> perhaps, try ipconfig in a prompt
>> I can see that the network is ok, and you do have an ip adress
>> I think Firestarter should be reconfigured.
